scripts.git:commit: sh -c 'COMMIT_MSG="$1"; git add . && git commit -m "$COMMIT_MSG" && echo "### $COMMIT_MSG" > scripts/.tmp_changelog_content.md && ts-node scripts/update-technical-changelog.ts --contentFile scripts/.tmp_changelog_content.md' --
scripts.git:commit:push: sh -c 'COMMIT_MSG="$1"; git add . && git commit -m "$COMMIT_MSG" && echo "### $COMMIT_MSG" > scripts/.tmp_changelog_content.md && ts-node scripts/update-technical-changelog.ts --contentFile scripts/.tmp_changelog_content.md --perform-amend && git push' --
